title: One Topic At A Time - Avoid bouncing the conversation from one topic to the next in every other mess
description: This is common for girls who have bad text game. She’ll reply to your message about topic, then ask a question about something else. It’s your job to choose one topic. #short
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "Women will basically walk you into this trap unconsciously a lot of the time is having multiple conversation threads going, right? So it's like you say something and she responds But then also ask an unrelated question and then you have to respond to the first thing and also to the second thing and then You know the situation I'm talking about right where it's like double message. It kills the flirting progression You know what? I mean and women will do that a lot what I just do is I ignore one of those threads and I just stick with Whichever one is best because it takes too long. Otherwise, you know, you're waiting She's writing books and you're writing books and it's just you kill the vibe a little bit there, you know I feel like this is the biggest mistake in the whole messaging I've seen so far because you do that here, right? You already said would that be the weirdest meetup? Certainly the weirdest would love to do it I would have just been like, you know heard about a cool hike with the possibility of finding some goat cuties Whatever.
